mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_ID ,'O' AS PASSWORD FROM MEMBERS M INNER JOIN GRADES G ON M.GRADE_CODE = G.GRADE_CODE WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND M.PASSWORD = #{PASSWORD} AND M.GRADE_CODE = 9

SELECT M.INPUT_DT ,M.USER_NAME ,M.MEMBER_ID ,M.EMAIL_ADDR ,G.GRADE_NAME ,M.PHONE_NUMBER ,M.STATUS ,M.GENDER ,M.BIRTH ,M.MEMBER_TYPE FROM MEMBERS M INNER JOIN GRADES G ON M.GRADE_CODE = G.GRADE_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{SEARCH_TEXT}), '%')
AND M.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{SEARCH_TEXT}), '%')
AND M.EMAIL_ADDR LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{SEARCH_TEXT}), '%')
AND G.GRADE_NAME = #{GRADE_NAME}
AND M.PHONE_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{PHONE_NUMBER}), '%')
AND M.INPUT_DT BETWEEN #{FIRST_LOGIN_DT} AND DATE_ADD(#{LAST_LOGIN_DT}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
SELECT '' AS GRADE_CODE ,'전체' AS GRADE_NAME UNION SELECT GRADE_CODE ,GRADE_NAME FROM GRADES ORDER BY GRADE_CODE

SELECT MEMBER_ID ,PASSWORD ,USER_NAME ,LOGIN_TYPE ,EMAIL_ADDR ,PHONE_NUMBER ,BIRTH ,GENDER ,GRADE_CODE ,FIRST_LOGIN_DT ,LAST_LOGIN_DT ,STATUS ,PRICE_AMOUNT ,INPUT_DT ,UPDATE_DT ,MEMBER_TYPE FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID ,M.USER_NAME ,M.EMAIL_ADDR ,M.PHONE_NUMBER ,M.GRADE_CODE ,G.GRADE_NAME ,M.PRICE_AMOUNT ,M.INPUT_DT FROM MEMBERS M INNER JOIN GRADES G ON M.GRADE_CODE = G.GRADE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND M.GRADE_CODE != 9
AND M.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',TRIM(#{USER_NAME}),'%')
AND M.EMAIL_ADDR LIKE CONCAT ('%',TRIM(#{EMAIL_ADDR}),'%')
AND M.INPUT_DT BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND DATE_ADD(#{EDATE}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND G.GRADE_CODE = #{GRADE_CODE}
SELECT '' AS GRADE_CODE, '전체' AS GRADE_NAME UNION SELECT GRADE_CODE ,GRADE_NAME FROM GRADES WHERE GRADE_CODE <> 9 ORDER BY GRADE_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS M SET M.GRADE_CODE = COALESCE( (SELECT G.GRADE_CODE FROM GRADES G WHERE M.PRICE_AMOUNT >= G.STANDARD_AMOUNT AND G.GRADE_CODE != 9 ORDER BY G.STANDARD_AMOUNT DESC LIMIT 1 ) ,1) WHERE M.GRADE_CODE != 9
mapper.select:
SELECT '0' AS CHK, M.MEMBER_ID, M.USER_NAME, M.EMAIL_ADDR, M.PHONE_NUMBER, M.PRICE_AMOUNT, M.STATUS,
CASE WHEN M.STATUS = 'R' THEN '휴면' WHEN M.STATUS = 'N' THEN '탈퇴' END AS STATUS_NAME, M.INPUT_DT, M.LAST_LOGIN_DT, M.UPDATE_DT, M.DELETE_DT,
CASE WHEN M.STATUS = 'R' THEN DATEDIFF(NOW(), COALESCE(M.LAST_LOGIN_DT, M.INPUT_DT)) WHEN M.STATUS = 'N' THEN DATEDIFF(NOW(), COALESCE(M.DELETE_DT,M.UPDATE_DT)) END AS DAYS_SINCE_CHANGE FROM MEMBERS M WHERE M.STATUS IN ('R', 'N')
AND M.STATUS = #{STATUS}
AND M.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{USER_NAME}), '%')
AND M.EMAIL_ADDR LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{EMAIL_ADDR}), '%')
AND M.INPUT_DT BETWEEN #{SEARCH_START_DATE} AND DATE_ADD(#{SEARCH_END_DATE}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND M.LAST_LOGIN_DT BETWEEN #{SEARCH_START_DATE} AND DATE_ADD(#{SEARCH_END_DATE}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND M.DELETE_DT BETWEEN #{SEARCH_START_DATE} AND DATE_ADD(#{SEARCH_END_DATE}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY CASE WHEN M.STATUS='R' THEN M.LAST_LOGIN_DT ELSE M.DELETE_DT END DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET STATUS = 'N', DELETE_DT = NOW(), UPDATE_DT = NOW() WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND STATUS != 'N'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBERS WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND DELETE_DT <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET STATUS = 'R' ,UPDATE_DT = NOW() WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND ( COALESCE(LAST_LOGIN_DT, INPUT_DT) <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) )
UPDATE MEMBERS SET STATUS = 'Y' ,LAST_LOGIN_DT = NOW() ,UPDATE_DT = NOW() WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND STATUS = 'R'
mapper.select:
SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.USER_NAME, M.PHONE_NUMBER, COALESCE(PT.TOTAL_POINT, 0) AS POINT, COALESCE(CP.COUPON_CNT, 0) AS COUPON_CNT FROM MEMBERS M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEMBER_ID, SUM(POINT) AS TOTAL_POINT FROM POINTS GROUP BY MEMBER_ID ) PT ON M.MEMBER_ID = PT.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEMBER_ID, COUNT(*) AS COUPON_CNT FROM COUPONS WHERE IS_USED = 'N' GROUP BY MEMBER_ID ) CP ON M.MEMBER_ID = CP.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.STATUS NOT IN('N', 'R', 'B')
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{MEMBER_ID}), '%')
AND M.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{USER_NAME}), '%')
AND M.PHONE_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{PHONE_NUMBER}), '%')
ORDER BY POINT DESC, COUPON_CNT DESC
SELECT '' AS CHANGE_TYPE, '전체' AS LABEL UNION SELECT DISTINCT CHANGE_TYPE ,CHANGE_TYPE AS LABEL FROM POINTS ORDER BY CHANGE_TYPE

SELECT C.COUPON_CODE ,C.COUPON_NAME ,C.COUPON_TYPE ,CASE WHEN C.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'R' THEN '%' WHEN C.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'G' THEN '₩' END AS DISCOUNT_UNIT ,C.DISCOUNT_VALUE ,C.MIN_ORDER_PRICE ,C.ISSUED_DT ,C.EXPIRY_DT ,C.IS_USED ,O.ORDER_NUMBER ,C.USED_DT FROM COUPONS C
LEFT JOIN ORDERS O ON C.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}
AND C.IS_USED = #{IS_USED}
AND C.COUPON_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{COUPON_TYPE}),'%')
AND C.ISSUED_DT BETWEEN #{SEARCH_START_DATE} AND DATE_ADD(#{SEARCH_END_DATE}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND C.EXPIRY_DT BETWEEN #{SEARCH_START_DATE} AND DATE_ADD(#{SEARCH_END_DATE}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY C.ISSUED_DT DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO POINTS( MEMBER_ID, CHANGE_TYPE, POINT, DESCRIPTION, INPUT_DT ) SELECT #{MEMBER_ID}, #{CHANGE_TYPE}, CASE WHEN #{CHANGE_TYPE} = '사용' THEN -ABS(#{POINT}) ELSE ABS(#{POINT}) END, #{DESCRIPTION}, NOW()
WHERE #{CHANGE_TYPE} != '사용' OR (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(POINT), 0) FROM POINTS WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}) >= ABS(#{POINT})
mapper.select:
SELECT M.MEMBER_ID ,M.USER_NAME ,M.EMAIL_ADDR ,M.PHONE_NUMBER ,G.GRADE_NAME ,M.UPDATE_DT ,M.INPUT_DT FROM MEMBERS M JOIN GRADES G ON M.GRADE_CODE = G.GRADE_CODE WHERE STATUS = 'B'
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{MEMBER_ID}),'%')
AND M.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{USER_NAME}),'%')
AND M.PHONE_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{PHONE_NUMBER}),'%')
AND M.INPUT_DT BETWEEN #{START_INPUT_DT} AND DATE_ADD(#{END_INPUT_DT}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY M.UPDATE_DT DESC;

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID ,R.REPORT_ID ,R.REPORT_TYPE ,R.REPORT_CONTENT ,R.REPORT_STATUS
,R.INPUT_DT FROM REPORT R
JOIN MEMBERS M ON R.BOARD_WRITER = M.MEMBER_ID
WHERE R.BOARD_WRITER = #{memberId} ORDER BY R.INPUT_DT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_STATUS = #{REPORT_STATUS}, STATUS_DT = NOW() WHERE REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}

SELECT MEMBER_ID ,USER_NAME ,PHONE_NUMBER ,CASE WHEN LOGIN_TYPE = 'IDPW' THEN '홈페이지' WHEN LOGIN_TYPE = 'KAKAO' THEN '카카오' END AS LOGIN_NAME ,LOGIN_TYPE ,INPUT_DT FROM MEMBERS WHERE 1=1
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{MEMBER_ID}),'%')
AND USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{USER_NAME}),'%')
AND PHONE_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{PHONE_NUMBER}),'%')
AND INPUT_DT BETWEEN #{INPUT_START_DT} AND DATE_ADD(#{INPUT_END_DT}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND LOGIN_TYPE = #{LOGIN_TYPE}
ORDER BY INPUT_DT DESC

SELECT
CASE A.LOGIN_TYPE WHEN 'IDPW' THEN '일반회원' WHEN 'KAKAO' THEN '카카오 회원' END AS LOGIN_TYPE ,COUNT(0) AS CNT ,ROUND(COUNT(0) * 100.0 / SUM(COUNT(0)) OVER (), 2) AS RATE FROM MEMBERS A WHERE A.LOGIN_TYPE IN ('IDPW', 'KAKAO') GROUP BY A.LOGIN_TYPE

SELECT MEMBER_ID ,USER_NAME ,PHONE_NUMBER ,CASE LOGIN_TYPE WHEN 'IDPW' THEN '홈페이지' WHEN 'KAKAO' THEN '카카오' END AS LOGIN_NAME ,LOGIN_TYPE ,INPUT_DT
,DELETE_DT FROM MEMBERS WHERE STATUS = 'N'
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{MEMBER_ID}),'%')
AND USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{USER_NAME}),'%')
AND LOGIN_TYPE = #{LOGIN_TYPE}
AND PHONE_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{PHONE_NUMBER}),'%')
AND DELETE_DT BETWEEN #{DELETE_START_DT} AND DATE_ADD(#{DELETE_END_DT}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DELETE_DT, '%Y-%m') AS DELETE_MONTH ,COUNT(0) AS CNT FROM MEMBERS WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND DELETE_DT IS NOT NULL GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DELETE_DT, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY DELETE_MONTH
